overview: An epic documentary on the vertiginous and tireless nightlife of actual day São Paulo. A bohemian road-movie fueled by parties, music, fashion, social networks, kisses, politics, love, and sex. All of it conducted by the great São Paulo metropolis.

production_companies.name: Secretaria de Cultura e Economia Criativa do Estado de São Paulo

title: Freak Night Fever in São Paulo
